ai-snp2.10:1.4_0: when injured by an arrow strike?
ai-snp2.10:2.4_0: King Okkāma has fallen under the sway of Death.
ai-snp2.10:3.3_0: This is where there’s no delight
ai-snp2.10:3.4_0: don’t let the moment pass you by.
ai-snp2.10:3.5_0: For if you miss your moment,
ai-snp2.10:3.6_0: you’ll grieve when sent to hell.
ai-snp2.10:4.4_0: pluck out the dart from yourself.
ai-snp2.10:4.5_0: I saw the tenth section on Tissa
